introduction.quote: Albedo — an alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius."Genius," "Kreideprinz," or "Captain of the Investigation Team"... Such titles and honors are of no consequence to him when there is so much more research to conduct.The pursuit of fortune and connections cannot hold a candle to his heart's desire — acquiring the limitless, obscure knowledge left behind by previous generations of scholars.
introduction.content: Albedo, also known as the "Kreideprinz" is a playable Geo character in Genshin Impact.The mysterious Albedo is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius through a recommendation from the adventurer Alice, with Sucrose as his assistant. He holds an infinite desire to learn about the world of Teyvat, carefully studying every object around him.

personality.quote: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.
content:
Albedo is described as an amiable and popular figure in Mondstadt, as well as an alchemical genius. He pursues the "truth" of the world of Teyvat per his master's request and seems to be able to create living organisms through his alchemical talents. Albedo is also good with children, as he gets along well with Klee, who considers him to be kind and patient, while he in turn sees her like a younger sister of sorts.
Similarly to Sucrose, Albedo spends most of his time as a recluse that he shows a slight distaste for talking with others because of the trouble needed to maintain the social relationship; he does not stutter like his assistant.
Albedo is a talented artist, having picked up the hobby initially to help with his experiments, but now does so to relax. He serves as Xingqiu's illustrator, considering him to be a good author. He researches and studies whatever he is interested in, stating that he enjoys the sense of enlightenment doing so. Once this feeling is gone, he quickly abandons what he was doing as the truth feels bittersweet to him. He retains this view when it comes to eating, preferring light dishes and sweets.
Despite being seen in a positive manner by the people of Mondstadt, they know almost nothing about him, and he is secretive about his past. He is implied to be a homunculus created by his master, as he curiously sees her as his creator, has no memory of his family and considers himself to be of a different "substance" compared to the people of Teyvat. Due to the forgotten and ancient knowledge he possesses, he even considers himself to be a threat, with both Venti and Dainsleif considering him to be dangerous for that reason.

appearance:
Albedo is a young man with bright teal eyes with three dots in his iris (similar to the alchemy table) and pale skin. He has ashy light blonde hair reaching below his shoulders, partially pulled back in a braided half ponytail. There is a golden diamond marking at the center of his neck.
Albedo wears a long white coat with short sleeves with a black hood, a golden chain at the back, and black and gold lining. It is unbuttoned but held with a black sash. Under this, he wears an indigo shirt and a pair of black shorts, along with plain black stockings, embellished thigh-high black boots with silver accents, and long black gloves with orange undersides and gold details. He wears his Vision right below the collar of his shirt. His outfit, Newmoon Starlight, is described to be the Knights of Favonius alchemist's uniform that Albedo often wears when conducting his experiments.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
talents.desc: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
talents.desc:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.Solar Isotoma has the following properties:
When enemies within the Solar Isotoma zone take damage, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
Solar Isotoma is a Geo Construct.
Hold to designate the location of the skill.

talents.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
talents.desc: Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.Tecotonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

talents.name: Calcite Might
talents.desc: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

talents.name: Homuncular Nature
talents.desc: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

talents.name: Flash of Genius (Albedo)
talents.desc: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellation.name: Flower of Eden
constellation.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellation.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellation.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellation.name: Grace of Helios
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Descent of Divinity
constellation.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellation.name: Tide of Hadean
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Dust of Purification
constellation.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
